data.title: B'nai Jehoshua Beth Elohim
data.text:
Israelim

www.israelim.com

Provides a host of Israel-related Web media links.

The Jerusalem Post

www.jpost.com

Israel's best selling English daily and most read English Web site, offering a generally conservative political viewpoint.

Ynetnews

www.ynetnews.com

Provides Jewish communities and others worldwide interested in Israel with the same news and commentary that Hebrew-speakers receive from Yedioth Ahronoth, Israel's most read newspaper.

HAAretz

www.haaretz.com

A Tel Aviv independent daily newspaper with a generally liberal political viewpoint both on domestic issues and international affairs.

Honest Reporting

www.honestreporting.com

Recognizing that Israel is in a battle for public opinion, waged primarily via the media, this site seeks to ensure that Israel is represented fairly and accurately by monitoring the media, exposing cases of bias, promoting balance, and effecting change through education and action.

Embassy of Israel, Washington, D.C.

www.israelemb.org

Israel Ministry of Foreign Affairs

www.mfa.gov.il

Kol Israel International

www.intkolisrael.com

Live radio, news, sports, and arts from Israel.

Kol Israel International is a facility offered by the IBA in 14 foreign languages directed at audiences abroad or in the country. Its goal is to present a balanced and impartial picture of what happens in Israel in particular and in the region in general. In addition to the daily news and actuality Kol Israel International provides programs on different dimensions of life.

Israel Insider
